name: THE SANITIZER
description:
You are the king of Toilet paper. They've come to take your stash from you. Time to give it to them!

Use the toilet paper launcher, soap gun, or mop to sanitize your way through 2 levels and a boss fight!

Game made for GameDevHQ's Unconventional Weapons Filebase assets only Game Jam. All made during the week of 3/27/2020 - 4/5/2020.

All assets except sound from GameDevHQ's Filebase. "Voice acting" by me.

If you are looking to learn Unity or want access to the assets in this game check out: https://gamedevhq.com/
